title: What is the best nutrition certification? - Quora

response.answer_text: I agree with Robert Edward’s statement. Don’t study at a governmental nutrition school. I recommend the Nutritional Therapy Association personally. It really teaches traditional and foundational nutrition and has previous students that use their credentials for a wide variety of capacities and even entrepreneur businesses.

Check out the AANC. They aren't a school, but an accredation agency. Study "Holistic Nutrition" and stay clear of conventional groups that are funded by companies that are partially responsible for our sicknesses and diseases like Pepsico, Hershey's, Coke, etc.
